website_summaries.verdict: An excellent buy if you want a product that looks a little different from your average window box.
pros: Made from stainless steel with an attractive "antique" finish
users are extremely pleased with its quality
cons: May be difficult to wall-mount due to its shape

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money, product rusts.
customer_reviews.text: The entire container is rusting through. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is such good quality and is so beautiful that I have ordered several of these in which to make succulent gardens. It arrived the day after I ordered it and I am very pleased with the product and the service.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Tinkey

customer_reviews.title: Sent someone’s return.
customer_reviews.text: Probably nice when it was new but this had to be a return. Could smell the pottting soil-musty like someone over watered when I opened the box and also scratched both sides. And the wlelding was not that great. Expected better for the price. So returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime P. Lovci

customer_reviews.title: It's Classy!
customer_reviews.text: If I'm going to put something on my counter or table, it needs to be stylish. I love growing plants and purchased this container to add some color to a 'very white kitchen'. I propagate small trees and plants and give them away as gifts to my friends and clients. This one is going to be very special, as I have about 10-12 small tree cuttings to plant in this container. Plus I have some chartreuse reindeer moss to pack over the soil. The color combo will be gorgeous. It'll cheer up that kitchen instantly!
customer_reviews.author: DawnBreaking

customer_reviews.title: Already corroded
customer_reviews.text: I have had this planter about 9 months and it is corroding in several places. I assumed the manufacturer would know that plants need to be watered so it should not be susceptible corrosion. It may last a few more months before it has to be replaced. Also, I have it inside so it is not even exposed to the elements, but it is supposed to be for a window box so i suspect it would not even be usable anymore if it were outside. Going for a clay pot next.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Aged copper window box.
customer_reviews.text: Love these planters, I have them on a shelf on front of a bright lit window with herbs. Really well made, good looking,too. The planters are some kind of light weight metal with an antique copper finish. They have a matching drip tray.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia E. Howard Hodgkins

customer_reviews.title: I love, love the flower box from H
customer_reviews.text: I love, love the flower box from H. Potter! I was so pleased that the flower box looked EXACTLY like the picture. The patina finish, and the size were the primary reasons I chose this one and I was not disappointed ! It looks so good that I've decided to place it in a more prominent spot! and, the packing. . .I must say a word about the packing. The packaging of the flower box showed that someone packed it with very much care. It was packed to make sure I received it in pristine condition. . .and I did!
customer_reviews.author: DDivine

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY ATTRACTIVE AND EXPERTLY CRAFTED
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and very well made. Planter arrived as promised and was securely packaged. Included a note from H Potter expressing desire to ensure total customer satisfaction. Will use on kitchen sill for several plants that have not done well in small pots. Expect great results and will likely buy several more once this one meets my high expectations. UPDATE: Purchased a second one which, like the first, arrived on time and in perfect condition thanks to meticulous packaging. Will place along large kitchen sill to match the original. The plants we repotted in the first one just over a month ago are thriving beautifully, as never before.. This planter is a gem!
customer_reviews.author: Wilmo

customer_reviews.title: Great planter!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my succulent garden. The planter is very well made and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Jesuit

customer_reviews.title: Great planter for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful planter. It met my expectations. It has a lower water tray that looks like it is a part of the unit. I squeezed 4 herb plants in here, but it looks like three would fit more comfortably once they start to grow larger. I am very happy with this product. It is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This pot is absolutely gorgeous! It’s exactly what I wanted and so worth the price! I never spend more than $10 on most of my pots but this one was exactly what I was looking for! I love it so much I’m placing an order for at least one more! I will totally look to see if this seller has more pots or supplies for my plants!
customer_reviews.author: Holyman

customer_reviews.title: This product will rust in for sure.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, but if you want to buy product from real copper don’t buy this item. Seller advertise it like made from real copper but it’s not. They just pain it to looks like copper!
customer_reviews.author: Igor Chepets

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional planter
customer_reviews.text: This is a really beautiful piece, especially relative to the price. I struggled to find an aesthetically appealing, rectangular planter that had drain holes. This one definitely does the trick. It's perfect for the ginger plant I have (ginger grows laterally, so long, narrow planters are needed).
customer_reviews.author: bw2008

customer_reviews.title: Super rectangular planter from H. Potter
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed rectangular flower planter (approx 16" long, 6" wide, 5" tall). Strong steel, perfect seams, beautiful copper-colored exterior, beautiful design; the matching water tray is just as nice: both made to last. TOTALLY CLASSY! GREAT PRICE! Fast delivery. Heavy cardboard shipping container. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Petros Ichthus

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gift
customer_reviews.text: I filled it with succulents and polished rocks and tiny seashells for an anniversary gift. They loved it. It is a great pot and the drainage tray fits tight so dust doesn’t collect like some tray designs allow.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great..
customer_reviews.text: Not perfect.. But.. Ordered 3..all were damaged. The company said they were imperfections since they were hand assembled. The company gladly shipped out 3 replacements which were much better than the first. Very happy they did the right thing. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: DAG

customer_reviews.title: Retainabled copper color
customer_reviews.text: Copper color "rusted" off in spots within a year. Solid item. Well constructed. My biggest complaint is the copper color
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE H POTTER
customer_reviews.text: Love this Planter! It looks beautiful on my formal living room coffee table with succulents. So much prettier in person, the glossy copper color is very rich looking. I also have a H Potter lanterns in my family room with fairy lights in it and that piece is undiscribably beautiful as Well! Thank you H Potter for superb products.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: very pretty: just barely fits four 4" pots
customer_reviews.text: Have four miniature roses in pots. If you want to keep your little pots, this works best for three. In may case, I will have to take my roses out and put them in potting soil to work well. The planter is lovely and I can't wait to finish up the presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Anya N

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and copper looks fancy
customer_reviews.text: Well made and attractive elegant planter. Useful size and makes a great gift for a seasoned gardener or one starting out to grow edibles. Any organic herbs or edibles would be easy to grow in this pot inside near window or outside on patio or anywhere. Price is right too.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it as much as I did.
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine since July of 2017, so not quite 2 years. I keep a cymbidium in it, so not tons of wet soil (in fact, the drip pan has never had any water in it). I noticed today that one of the corner seams has rusted through and there is leakage outside the container. Originally I really loved the way it looked and fit my space. Now I wonder how long it will actually last!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Herb Planter
customer_reviews.text: The planters are a perfect size and appearance to place on my stone patio. The design, color, and plastic liner would prompt me to consider giving this item as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: An American Girl

customer_reviews.title: WORTHY, IN EVERY WAY, OF FIVE STAR REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: Slick, nicely proportioned, very well made and perfectly-sized for the three (3) manfreda undulata "chocolate chip" plants sitting on the sill above the bed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kruger

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two. I planted green cactus in them both since I live in Nevada. The planters with the cactus looks very elegant on my outdoor firepit table set and on my outdoor furniture area.
customer_reviews.author: Vinny Cookson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I just love my planter boxes! They were exactly like the picture! I filled them with artificial Boston Fern and placed them on the ledge behind my TV to block the back from the kitchen. It does a perfect job! They are beautiful and functional. I am so happy with my purchase. They will remain indoors where I intended them to be.
customer_reviews.author: Rose F.

customer_reviews.title: If you like copper, you’ll love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It’s so well made! It’s a perfect size and the design is amazing! I can’t wait to get one for my front railing!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Skahill

customer_reviews.title: Classic look
customer_reviews.text: I just received and it quite lovely! I am looking forward to making it a mini garden. From other comments I will be adding gravel and charcoal chips in container.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Indoor Planter
customer_reviews.text: Planter is very nice and good for use for the indoors. I am using between the kitchen and den with a philodendron plant. Very happy I found this as it is hard to find in stores.
customer_reviews.author: M. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Wrong dimension
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the planter using the published dimensions. My pots measured 5" across and felt they should fit in a 6'" planter. However, the planter is 6" across at the top and tapers to about 4 1/2" at the bottom. Naturally they do not fit. I wanted so much for this to work and the planter itself is very nice. I suppose it was not meant to hold plants already in a pot.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful planter
customer_reviews.text: Very well made planter. Pleased to see its quality. I am also impressed that the owner of the company replied to my email within an hour!! Very happy customer here, will return to buy more of their products in future with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought Two!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and craftsmanship. Exactly what I was looking for. Well worth the price. Boxed perfectly to avoid any damages during shipping. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin H

customer_reviews.title: so with a 4 1/2" base this is perfect. It's so much classier than the plastic pot ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous! I have only a 6" window sill where I can grow my succulents, so with a 4 1/2" base this is perfect. It's so much classier than the plastic pot I was using for my hen & chicks. I will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Linda F.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful High Quality Planter
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product and craftsmanship! Very happy with purchase. I received one that was missing a tray and reached out to them and they sent me the tray and another planter. Outstanding customer service!
customer_reviews.author: devin white

customer_reviews.title: Harry Potter planters
customer_reviews.text: Love this planter as it's just the right size for my shamrock plants, plus it matches the tall HP planter that I purchased a few months ago.
customer_reviews.author: MO

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty planter with a nice matching water catching tray that is unnoticeable.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Planters!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I Have several shapes and sizes, love them all. Very Well made and looks gorgeous..
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this, its garbage.
customer_reviews.text: This is something that shouldnt be sold. I normally look at reviews before i buy, somehow i missed this one. Its rotting after a week. Its metal with a poor coating on it so its immediately rusting at the seems and bottom. now i have to buy something completely different and throw this junk away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Planter for inside or outside!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful planter. I bought two — one for inside and one for outside.
customer_reviews.author: Sara, SC

customer_reviews.title: ... very attractive and holds the three small matching pots nicely, thereby avoiding any unintentional leaks if I overwater ...
customer_reviews.text: This is very attractive and holds the three small matching pots nicely, thereby avoiding any unintentional leaks if I overwater my herbs and it fits perfectly on my cabinet above the sink. Looks very nice with our granite, too!
customer_reviews.author: Blessed Okie

customer_reviews.title: Seams Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece but the seams are not waterproof. We had to caulk several times to get it right. We are going hydroponics so didn’t want leaks. I actually would like to order another if it is waterproof. Let me know
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Ganz

customer_reviews.title: Love this planter ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these potters for a ledge on our porch; they are beautiful! The durability while they maintain their beauty, is amazing. The one we purchased last year looks JUST as amazing as the one we purchased just weeks ago.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey A Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful. I have it on my kitchen counter with Succulents and it is perfect. Will enjoy it for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: San Jose Nana

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is great sitting on my desk. Filled with succulents it looks wonderful. Would definitely by again.
customer_reviews.author: A.Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful finish and has a nice weight to it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful finish and has a nice weight to it. It is not too heavy but the feel has quality written all over it.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty and made very well. Looks exactly like the photos.
customer_reviews.author: lockvideo10

customer_reviews.title: The quality and finish gets a 5 star.
customer_reviews.text: This pot was the perfect size for my 4 small pots of flowers. I love the fact that it had weeping holes and a tray. And it fitted just right on my very narrow fireplace mantel. I would buy it again. The quality and finish was perfect. Do you also make it in a silver finish?
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Useful and nice for decorating inside or out!
customer_reviews.text: It was a great gift. Very nice looking and well made!
customer_reviews.author: Band_Addict_123

customer_reviews.title: Great planting box at good price.
customer_reviews.text: very nice box, good quality, very satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: BarbieF

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully styled copper planter.
customer_reviews.text: This planter is very pretty. There are no rough edges, and I love that it has a tray to collect excess watering. I put mine on my kitchen island in front of the sink - so cheery and it hides water splashes.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L Flores

customer_reviews.title: Planted orchids
customer_reviews.text: Planted orchids tonight in the planter. It sits in my window above my sink. Perfect size and looks so nice. Good quality. Came quickly and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful window sill planter perfect for 3 or 4 small flowers. Matches everything!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the planter - it looked “classy” and it had a tray underneath that fit well and would hold any water drip-throughs.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.text: This window box is exactly as described and I really like it.

customer_reviews.title: Great Planter - Just Right Size for Growing Herbs
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful planter! I have it in my kitchen near my window here I am growing herbs - basil and rosemary. Looks great and size is perfect!

customer_reviews.title: Elegant succulent flower planter
customer_reviews.text: I got the bronze coloured succulent indoor planters for my daughter. We just received them yesterday and they are beautiful, very classy for her antique and oriental themed dining room. They arrived very quickly after the order was placed and securely packaged.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful copper finish
customer_reviews.text: I love the copper finish and shape of this planter, and the drip tray is a great feature. Thank you for this high quality planter!

customer_reviews.title: Highest quality on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Much higher quality than any other pots I've gotten off Amazon! A solid, attractive metal, with drainage and the whole bit.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: We love it. The color is beautiful and lot of succulent can fit. It gives an uplift to the family room.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful planter and looks fantastic in my kitchen window
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful planter and looks fantastic in my kitchen window. Only drawback is the holes in the bottom are not large enough for water to drain effectively. My African Violets are dying because the holes filled with soil and did not allow excess water to drain.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!

product_meta.title: H Potter Herb Planter Pots Succulent Window Box Rectangular Indoor Outdoor Flower Garden Planters Dimensions 16 x 6 x 5.75 Inches
feature_bullets: HANDCRAFTED – HOME DÉCOR ACCENT – Stainless steel rectangular succulent planter box with an antique copper hand-applied finish for luxurious appeal. This indoor planter box is current with a timeless feel. Use indoors as an herb or succulent planter on a windowsill to connect with the outdoors or place outdoors on your patio, deck, or tabletop. Complete with custom rectangular drainage tray, this home décor accent is designed to add character to your living space. No plants included.

NATURE BASED PLANTER FOR ALL SEASONS – At widest outer points approximately 16 inches long by 6 inches wide by 5.75 inches high, this planter garden box will make an eye-catching focal point and impressive statement wherever it’s placed. Sold as a single garden planter, beautiful displayed as centerpieces or multiples lining your dining table. Unique and sturdy, if you’re looking for something memorable, this beautiful window box planter. A perfect wedding decoration or birthday gift idea.

HEAVY AND DURABLE CONSTRUCTION – Built to last, use with any seasonal succulent décor. Stunning filled with herbs or as succulent or flower pots and covered with sheet moss or plant directly inside the metal planter. Easy to update and freshen your holiday decor. Try a color theme this season and a texture theme next month. Simple enough to blend with any home décor. Trending now, succulent planters with the rich antique copper finish adds earthy warmth to your traditional or modern home.

INTRICATE DETAILING – MINIMALIST STYLE – Succulent Plants not only promote a healthy home environment but can offer a touch of elegant beauty to your home and garden. Uniquely designed with a heavy, durable construction, the H Potter rectangular succulent planter is perfect for alfresco dining and outdoor living. Tranquility of greenery is an ideal mood setter and stress reliever, this gardening planter is the perfect size to fit any location and can be moved easily.

QUALITY BY H POTTER – H Potter has been designing and manufacturing premium quality garden products for over 20 years. We do not pretend to be the cheapest, but you get what you pay for. Packaged well, with stunning craftsmanship and backed by great customer service, we’re proud to say our garden products are built to last.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars298 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
